ai-patthana21.46:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.46:0.3_0: Transmigration for requisites, for the sake of a comprehension.
ai-patthana21.46:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without troubles. ...
ai-patthana21.46:2.1_0: Not for the sake of defilement, not for the sake of grasping. ...
ai-patthana21.46:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.46:2.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.46:3.1_0: They don’t have a teaching that’s not dependent on space.
ai-patthana21.46:3.1_1: ... it is the cause of the reason for the first three enquiry ...
ai-patthana21.46:3.1_2: one person is building up one another while mutually saying:
ai-patthana21.46:3.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.46:4.1_0: Not for the sake of defilement, not for the sake of offering the floods, with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.46:4.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
